alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River; Yukon Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 14 at 11:26PM AKDT until October 15 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range, Dalton Highway Summits, Yukon Flats, White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River and Central Interior. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River; Yukon Flats
